mapper.insert: insert into CATEGORIES (CUSTOMER_ID, CUSTOMER_NAME, PASSWORD, SSN, PHONE, CITY, ADDRESS, POSTALCODE, PHOTO) values (#{customerId},#{customerName},#{passWord},#{ssn},#{phone},#{city},#{address},#{postalcode},#{photo})
mapper.select: select * from Blog CATEGORIES where CATEGORY_NAME = #{categoryName}
select * from Blog CATEGORIES where CATEGORY_ID = #{value}
mapper.update: update Author set CUSTOMER_NAME = #{customerName}, PASSWORD = #{passWord}, SSN = #{ssn}, PHONE = #{phone}, CITY = #{city}, ADDRESS = #{address}, POSTALCODE = #{postalcode}, PHOTO = #{photo}, where CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId}
